CustomField.formula: TEXT ( YEAR( SetoffStartDate__c) ) +"-"+ IF(MONTH(SetoffStartDate__c) < 10, "0" + TEXT(MONTH(SetoffStartDate__c)), TEXT(MONTH(SetoffStartDate__c)) ) +"-"+ IF(DAY(SetoffStartDate__c) < 10, "0" + TEXT(DAY(SetoffStartDate__c)), TEXT(DAY(SetoffStartDate__c)) ) + " ~ " + TEXT ( YEAR( SetoffEndDate__c) )+"-" + IF(MONTH(SetoffEndDate__c) < 10, "0" + TEXT(MONTH(SetoffEndDate__c)), TEXT(MONTH(SetoffEndDate__c)) ) +"-"+ IF(DAY(SetoffEndDate__c) < 10, "0" + TEXT(DAY(SetoffEndDate__c)), TEXT(DAY(SetoffEndDate__c)) )
CustomField.label: Setoff Period
